game

Class Pick

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Pick

  • public class Pick
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create a pick which contains all the districts and wonders for the game. There is only one pick by game.
    Author:
    bpotiron

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int listLimit 
      private java.util.List<District> pick 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pick()
      Constructor for the pick.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCardInPick(District district)
      This method add a district at the end of the pick (correspond to the last card in the list)
      private void creationOfCards()
      This method create the cards objects and put them in the pick
      District drawCard()
      This method draw a card on the top of the pick (correspond to the first card in the list) If there's not enough card to the pick, then an exception is throw.
      int getPickSize()
      Getter of the listLimit variable
      private void shufflePick()
      This method shuffle all the pick.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • pick

        private java.util.List<District> pick

      • listLimit

        private int listLimit

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pick

        public Pick()
        Constructor for the pick. The constructor initialize the pick with all the districts and also initialize the limit of the list.

    • Method Detail

      • drawCard

        public District drawCard()
        This method draw a card on the top of the pick (correspond to the first card in the list) If there's not enough card to the pick, then an exception is throw.
        Returns:
        the card picked by the player

      • addCardInPick

        public void addCardInPick(District district)
        This method add a district at the end of the pick (correspond to the last card in the list)
        Parameters:
        district - which is the card to add in the pick

      • getPickSize

        public int getPickSize()
        Getter of the listLimit variable
        Returns:
        the number of cards in the pick

      • creationOfCards

        private void creationOfCards()
        This method create the cards objects and put them in the pick

      • shufflePick

        private void shufflePick()
        This method shuffle all the pick. Shouldn't be called before the initialization of the pick.
